vote.text: Amendment SA 3684 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3684 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3666. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To improve the amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3684 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3666.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3684 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
